name: Burn Them
description:
You woke up in a strange place, the world around is in darkness, and in your pocket there is only a flashlight, screams of monsters are heard from afar, the light of your flashlight burns through their flesh! You can still be saved!

Burn Them - A top-down game where the player, using a flashlight of his choice, burns monsters and collects different items from chests to help him in a strange and gloomy world of different labirint-shaped corridors, as if the hero was in his scariest nightmare.

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Atmosphere
- Difficulty
